snippet: Lawmakers are considering a bill to keep the names of police officers secret from the news media and public.
abstract: Virginia lawmakers are considering measure that will keep names of police officers secret from news media and public, response to what law enforcement officials say is growing attitude of contempt toward police officers.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers are considering a bill to keep the names of police officers secret from the news media and public.

headline.main: Virginia: Bill Would Keep Officers’ Names Secret
headline.print_headline: Virginia: Bill Would Keep Officers’ Names Secret
